question: 感想
sourceMnemonic: When you take your <kanji>feeling</kanji>s and <kanji>concept</kanji>ualize them, you come up with your impressions and thoughts on the subject. That's why this word is <vocabulary>thoughts</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>impressions</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
